PLTalk: The creators of Elixir, Elm, and Julia talk language funding
<https://www.twitch.tv/jeanqasaur>

attachments.title: jeanqasaur - Twitch
attachments.text: Programming languages, software correctness, APIs, and the future of livestreamed love. Tune in for my weekly programming langauges stream with Hongyi Hu (security @ Figma) Fridays 3pm PT.

text: Is this where the secret julia marketing money is going?!
